f:I[63327,["/_next/static/chunks/2fd32df42ef26f8b.js","/_next/static/chunks/f501513783488158.js"],"default"]
10:T1838,<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Development Guide</h1>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Docker-Based Development (Recommended)</h2>
Develop without installing Python or dependencies locally. All you need is Docker and a code editor.
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Setup</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/VibhuviOiO/docker-registry-ui.git
cd docker-registry-ui
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Development Workflow</h3>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Build the development environment
docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml build
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Start registry and UI in development mode</h1>
docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">View logs</h1>
docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml logs -f registry-ui
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Stop services</h1>
docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml down
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Live Reload</h3>
The development compose file mounts your local code directories:


<code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">app/</code> - Python backend code
<code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">templates/</code> - HTML templates
<code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">static/</code> - CSS and JavaScript

<p class="text-gray-700 mb-4 leading-relaxed">Changes to these files are reflected immediately. For Python changes, restart the container:</p>

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.dev.yml restart registry-ui
</code></pre>
<h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 mb-3 mt-6">Access Points</h3>

<strong class="text-gray-900">UI</strong>: http://localhost:5003
<strong class="text-gray-900">Registry</strong>: http://localhost:5001
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Local Python Development (Alternative)</h2>
If you prefer running Python locally:

<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Create virtual environment
python3 -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Install dependencies</h1>
pip install -r requirements.txt
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Run application (recommended)</h1>
python run.py
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Or run as ASGI (matches production image)</h1>
uvicorn asgi:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5000
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Project Structure</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300">docker-registry-ui/
├── run.py                 # Application entrypoint (Flask factory)
├── asgi.py                # ASGI wrapper for production (uvicorn)
├── app/
│   ├── data_store.py     # Scan results storage
│   ├── registry.py       # Registry API client
│   └── scanners/
│       └── trivy.py      # Trivy scanner integration
├── static/
│   ├── css/              # Stylesheets
│   └── js/               # JavaScript files
├── templates/            # HTML templates
├── docker/               # Docker configuration
└── docs/                 # Documentation
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Technology Stack</h2>

<strong class="text-gray-900">Backend</strong>: Python 3.9+, Flask
<strong class="text-gray-900">Frontend</strong>: Vanilla JavaScript, Bootstrap 5
<strong class="text-gray-900">Scanner</strong>: Trivy
<strong class="text-gray-900">API</strong>: Docker Registry v2 API
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Running Tests</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Run unit tests
python -m pytest tests/
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Run with coverage</h1>
python -m pytest --cov=app tests/
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Building Production Image</h2>
<pre class="overflow-x-auto rounded-lg bg-gray-900 p-4 mb-4 border border-gray-700"><code class="text-sm font-mono text-gray-300"># Build production image
docker build -t docker-registry-ui:latest .
<h1 class="text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-4 mt-8">Test production image</h1>
docker run -d -p 5000:5000 \
  -v $(pwd)/data:/app/data \
  docker-registry-ui:latest
</code></pre>
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Development Tips</h2>

<strong class="text-gray-900">Code Editor</strong>: Use any editor (VS Code, PyCharm, etc.)
<strong class="text-gray-900">Debugging</strong>: Check logs with <code class="px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 text-sm font-mono">docker-compose logs -f</code>
<strong class="text-gray-900">Database</strong>: No database required - stateless design
<strong class="text-gray-900">Hot Reload</strong>: Frontend changes (HTML/CSS/JS) reflect immediately
<strong class="text-gray-900">Backend Changes</strong>: Restart container for Python changes
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Contributing</h2>

Fork the repository
Create a feature branch
Make your changes
Write tests
Submit a pull request
<h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900 mb-3 mt-8">Code Style</h2>

Follow PEP 8 for Python code
Use ESLint for JavaScript
Write descriptive commit messages
Add comments for complex logic6:["$","div",null,{"className":"flex min-h-[calc(100vh-4rem)]","children":[["$","$Lf",null,{"groups":[{"title":"Getting Started","items":[{"id":"getting-started","title":"Installation","slug":"getting-started"},{"id":"configuration","title":"Configuration","slug":"configuration"}]},{"title":"Features","items":[{"id":"features","title":"Overview","slug":"features"},{"id":"security","title":"Security Scanning","slug":"security"},{"id":"bulk-operations","title":"Bulk Operations","slug":"bulk-operations"}]},{"title":"Examples","items":[{"id":"multi-registry","title":"Multi-Registry Setup","slug":"examples/multi-registry"},{"id":"basic-auth","title":"Basic Auth Registry","slug":"examples/basic-auth"}]},{"title":"Reference","items":[{"id":"api","title":"API Integration","slug":"api"},{"id":"development","title":"Development","slug":"development"},{"id":"testing","title":"Testing Guide","slug":"testing"}]}],"basePath":"/docker-registry-ui","title":"$undefined"}],["$","main",null,{"className":"flex-1 min-w-0","children":["$","div",null,{"className":"mx-auto max-w-4xl px-6 py-8","children":[["$","div",null,{"className":"mb-8","children":["$","$L5",null,{"href":"/docker-registry-ui","className":"text-sm text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 flex items-center gap-1","children":"← Back to Docker Registry UI"}]}],["$","article",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","children":[["$","h1",null,{"className":"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 mb-2","children":"Development Guide"}],["$","p",null,{"className":"text-gray-600 text-lg mb-8","children":"Development Guide for Docker Registry UI"}],["$","div",null,{"className":"prose max-w-none","dangerouslySetInnerHTML":{"__html":"$10"}}]]}]]}]}]]}]
